title: Ticket #517: RFE: shadow reconnection on startd failure (esp VM universe)
description: The reconnect code currently handles a schedd/shadow crash by allowing the shadow to reconnect to a starter. The reverse does not work. Typically this is not a problem since the loss of a startd/starter means the running job is killed, except in the corner case of master,startd,starter mass death. However, when considering the VM universe, the running VM may continue to run and is a candidate for reconnection.
remarks:
2009-Jul-13 11:00:51 by matt:
This may also work as a step toward reconnection to starters in general - a feature with multiple benefits, including a path for startd upgrading.
